page.title: 17 AGRICULTURE (1),MAIDSTONE
page.content: Due to the proximity of the town of Maidstone, much of the agricultural land and natural habitats have been engulfed in projects such as light industry (744586); Industrial Estates at Quarry Wood (725575) and Holt Wood (720578);recreation facilities; golf course (at Cobtree manor (746587) and communications (733583). The main agricultural concern in this particular area is{Hermitage Farm {(729562).}It is a{mixed farm}and is situated on the Hythe Beds. There is extensive{soft fruit}cultivation including strawberries, gooseberries, raspberries and rhubarb. In addition hops, potatoes, horseradish and black- and red-currants are grown. At 732564 there are{apple,plum and pear} {trees.Oil seed rape}was seen at 733574.{Beef cattle}could also be seen at various locations.{Arable crops}
